name: angular-template
description: A starter template for Angular projects with ESLint, Prettier, and custom scripts.
author: Jagoda11

scripts.start: echo '🚀 Starting development server...' && ng serve
scripts.watch: echo '👀 Watching for changes...' && ng build --watch --configuration development
scripts.test: echo '🧪 Running tests with coverage...' && ng test --watch=false --browsers=ChromeHeadless --code-coverage
scripts.lint-fix: echo '🔧 Linting and fixing issues...' && eslint --fix . && prettier --write .
scripts.format: echo '✨ Formatting code with Prettier...' && prettier --write .
scripts.clean: echo '🧽 Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.docker-clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning up Docker resources...' && docker stop $(docker ps -aq) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && docker image prune -af && docker volume prune -f && docker network prune -f && docker builder prune -f
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$DOCKER" = "true" ]; then npm install typescript@5.5.4 --legacy-peer-deps; fi
scripts.generate-tests: echo '🛠️ Generating missing test files... 📂' && node scripts/generate-tests.js && echo '✅ Test generation complete! 🎉'
scripts.generate-docs: echo '📚 Generating documentation... ✍️' && compodoc -p tsconfig.app.json -d documentation && echo '✅ Documentation generation complete! 🎉'
scripts.serve-docs: echo '🚀 Serving documentation at http://127.0.0.1:8080... 🌐' && compodoc -s -d documentation && echo '🛑 Documentation server stopped.'
